name: Ballorama (LyonLin)
description:
4 days game jam #5: Ballorama

Ballorama is a team-based multiplayer competitive game

Work in groups to combine the most balls you can

  • Combining balls makes as slightly larger single ball
  • The more balls a team collects, the more points they have
  • Avoid losing balls to opposing players

Controls:

WASD to move, mouse to aim.

Spacebar to shoot

Shooting other players causes a ball to drop at their location from their base.
